about_the_game:
"Ah, what a lovely and completely normal day, I sure hope I don't get teleported into another dimension."
-Some guy who probably got teleported into another dimension.

WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF SIMPLETOONS
A simple and cartoonish world based on the comics and animations of Lukeshardo's SimpleToons series, where downright ridiculous situations during the day are as common and plentiful as mosquitos in the summer.

CHOOSE THE CHARACTERS' FATES
Follow James in his attempts to escape his immense boredom, whether by hanging out with his friends, climbing up mountains for no reason, or simply cooking a nice meal (hopefully without burning anything down). You can decide between these scenarios and more that each end in goofier ways than the last.

short_description: In this Choose Your Own Adventure spin-off of the comic/animated series, SimpleToons, you get to choose between a multitude of routes to determine how the main character's day gets to go, with plenty of cartoonishly comedic moments and hijinx to ensue!
